data.description: Sign-in with your Verisure My Pages account.
Your account has 2-step verification enabled. Please enter the verification code Verisure sends to you.

installation.description: Home Assistant found multiple Verisure installations in your My Pages account. Please, select the installation to add to Home Assistant.

data.description: Re-authenticate with your Verisure My Pages account.

error.unknown_mfa: Unknown error occurred during MFA set up

data.lock_code_digits: Number of digits in PIN code for locks

capture_smartcam.name: Capture SmartCam image
capture_smartcam.description: Captures a new image from a Verisure SmartCam.

enable_autolock.name: Enable autolock
enable_autolock.description: Enables autolock of a Verisure Lockguard Smartlock.

disable_autolock.name: Disable autolock
disable_autolock.description: Disables autolock of a Verisure Lockguard Smartlock.
